abstract.p: John Nieman is leaving as D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles vice chairman and worldwide creative director (S)

block.p: The top creative executive at D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles in New York, part of the B Com3 Group, is leaving the agency. John Nieman, vice chairman and worldwide creative director at D'Arcy, is leaving, effective May 1, the agency said, ''to devote more time to his family and to his own personal exploration of life's possibilities.''

Mr. Nieman, 51, joined D'Arcy in 1989 as vice chairman and chief creative officer U.S.A. He rose to vice chairman and worldwide creative director in 1992, and from 1996 through 1998 held additional responsibility for New York creative duties.
